prodNameC: 羅氏可霸斯免疫分析鐵蛋白檢驗試劑
ingredientsDesc:
Reagent – working solutions：
M   Streptavidin-coated microparticles (transparent cap), 1 bottle, 6.5 mL: Streptavidin-coated microparticles 0.72 mg/mL; preservative.
R1  Anti-Ferritin-Ab~biotin (gray cap), 1 bottle, 10 mL: Biotinylated monoclonal anti-ferritin  
     antibody (mouse) 3.0 mg/L; phosphate buffer 100 mmol/L, pH 7.2; preservative.
R2  Anti-ferritin-Ab~Ru(bpy)2+3 (black cap), 1 bottle, 10 mL: Monoclonal anti-ferritin antibody  
     (mouse) labeled with ruthenium complex 6.0 mg/L; phosphate buffer 100 mmol/L, pH 
     7.2; preservative.

CalSet – working solutions：
• FERR Cal1: 2 bottles, each containing 1.0 mL of calibrator 1
• FERR Cal2: 2 bottles, each containing 1.0 mL of calibrator 2
Ferritin (human, liver) in two concentration ranges (approx. 10 μg/L or ng/mL and approx. 300 μg/L or ng/mL) in a human serum matrix.
applicantName: 台灣羅氏醫療診斷設備股份有限公司
applicantAddr: 台北市中山區民權東路3段2號10樓
efficacy: 預定使用於 Elecsys以及cobas e免疫分析儀，在體外以免疫分析法針對人類血清和血漿中的鐵蛋白進行定量檢測。Elecsys Ferritin CalSet是使用於Elecsys和cobas e免疫分析儀上,針對Elecsys Ferritin定量分析法的校正品。

mdKind.mdKindMCodeName: C 免疫學及微生物學裝置
mdKind.mdKindDCodeName: C.5340 鐵蛋白免疫試驗系統

mdKind.mdKindMCodeName: A 臨床化學及臨床毒理學
